title: Brand new to the jungle, would love some tips with Skarner
body:
I've been wanting to learn how to jungle for a while now and now that the jungle has changed it seemed like a good time.  Whats a good route?  right now i'm going smite krug (to get me some stun), wolves, red buff with smite.  I then kind of have too go back cause I down to 35%-ish health.  When I go out I decide where i'm going to gank first after getting blue.

unfortunately the new patch made my krug start worse and my build path into rangers-devourer slightly lacking in dmg (the -24 dmg start means 12 less stacks...)  

any tips would be greatly appreciated.
(but I'm sticking with the bug)

replies.body:
If you're starting Krug I wouldn't smite it, get a hard leash from your team then smite the red buff for HP. If you're starting blue do Gwomp (instant smite) -> Blue - Go apply pressure in mid @ level 2 -> red (Smite) -> Birds -> Back. Krug start can do the same at level 2 with the hp from smiting red. Pressuring mid at level 2 can impact their trades and gives you something to do while waiting for smite. Just don't over commit and lose a ton of HP.

Also if you want my honest opinion, attack speed runes do give you a better clear time and early clear but I prefer hybrid pen and running devourer/ibg for mixed damage. It makes your damage a lot more effective. You already get attack speed from Q and once you buy the devourer enchant you have plenty.

Try **page 18** of this guys masteries.

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/19881925#masteries

On that note you can run any marks you want (AD/AS/HyPen) and they all "work" because they're all relevant stats.

Thanks guys, someone asked what  my runes and masterys were and I'm following this guys guide except i only have 3 of the attack speed marks ( I have the rest of the Runes).

any tips on attacking camps in general?  right now I just right click on the largest guy in the camp and wwqqwqwqwq in some order, should I be moving while i am attacking?

I almost always start gromp with low damage high tank junglers. Smite gromp do wolves smite red then look for a gank or clear Krugs then back for a trailblazer. 

Skarner tips:

-Skarner is the best sheen builder in the game. I personally very much prefer Trinity but some people love frozen fist. I usually build Sheen, Phage, finish juggernaut then finish Trinity into a full tank build. 

-Remember to trigger your shield before attacking a camp to speed boost into it. 

-dry ults are never better than stacked ults. Remember you can add a good amount of extra burst by landing EQ then ulting as opposed to just ulting. 

-Amateur Skarners love the ult+drag enemy but I almost always use it just to lock down and attack unless I'm way ahead of my team. If I burst an enemy down and wind up closer to the enemy team after, then I'm not just an ult bot.
Huh, that's weird, I do the same you do, Krugs-Wolves-Red, but I can also clear blue and gromp afterwards, what are your masteries?

path largely depends on your jungler and what side your playing on. But for skarner i would highly suggest starting gromp with smite. then take blue then got o red smite should be back up. Take it with smite you should hit lvl 3 then go for a gank then go b after that.
i been starting blue to wolves wait a couple secs for smite then red and gank or farm jung
